resources.string:
Read me!
How to use E-Kréta:
1. Enter your username and password
a) Your username is your OM ID by default
b) Your password is your birth-date in YYYY-MM-DD or YYYYMMDD format
2. You should get a feedback in a few moments if network is available
3. If your username or password is incorrect, repeat step 1-2!
Notifications between 22:00 and 6:00 do not vibrate and flash LED even if it is set
Unknown error! Consider trying it again later!
You entered wrong username or password combination! Click on the notification to edit
You haven\'t got a new grade!
Something has changed, most likely a grade had been corrected

Developer:
Cseh András
App version:
%1$s
Icons by: Freepik & ToffeeNut
Uses Android-Job by evernote
Unofficial app!
No grades were found! If you do have some, try it again later!
It looks like you have no grades yet…
Ordered by subject, with averages, click on grades for details
Grades in table, ordered by subject and date

Your grades are in descending order, ordered by date. Click on them to see more details, eg. the exact date or teacher.
Click on the refresh icon, to re-download all your grades.
By clicking on the pin icon, you can remove or move the grades shortcut to the homescreen (turned on by default).
In order for Karinthy Napló to work properly, please add it to the list of NOT OPTIMIZED, WHITELISTED or PROTECTED apps
Oh shoot! You need to open the settings app and manually add Karinthy Napló to the whitelisted apps :(
Oh shoot! You need to open the settings app and manually add Karinthy Napló to the protected apps :(
Fill in the class field! (use capital letters!)
If your name may be displayed multiple ways, separate those by comma (strongly recommended!)
There is no new substitution for you!
In order for Karinthy Napló to work properly on Huawei devices, additional settings need to be done. Please, in the next screen set KFGapp to manual control, but leave all other boxes enabled!
Oh no, it did not work :(. Open settings app, select Battery->Launch, and in the next screen set KFGapp to manual control, but leave all other boxes enabled!

The manufacturer of your device has made additional changes in the Android system, which make it impossible for some apps to run in the background. For the proper function of KFGapp please add this app to the list of the exceptions on the next screen (the list with the fewer apps, probably)
Oh no, it did not work :(. Please open the Settings or Device optimizer app and try to find the proper settings manually, otherwise KFGapp will not work properly :(
Vibrate, make sound or flash led?
Vibrate, make sound or flash led?
Click here to edit! Your username is your OM ID by default and your password is your birthdate
This new version of KFGapp does not support the old Napló fro now on. Please open the app to login into E-Kréta!
An error occurred in the database! Please press the refresh button or wipe app data in the settings!
No timetable is available for the chosen day
Since your login credentials are easily accessible to many ppl, it is strongly recommended to change your password in the desktop E-Kréta!
Automatically ignore irrelevant lessons based on your timetable. If you don\'t have the subject in the given period, you will not be notified (experimental)

It looks like
you have no lessons on this day!
This function works incorrectly on some devices (eg. Huawei). If the icon of the program disappears and you cannot open it, please remove and reinstall KFGNapló from Google Play!

It looks like
you have no absences!
It looks like you have no absences at all…
